trailhead.description: Dawn light spills across the ranger trailhead. A weathered noticeboard leans beside a supply crate, while footpaths diverge toward a grove and a scavenger camp.

choices.description: Check the supply crate for navigation aids.
Follow the path toward the whispering grove.
Visit the scavenger camp down the ridge.
Head straight for the distant ruins.

look.narration: Birdsong mingles with the creak of the noticeboard. Footprints criss-cross the mud, hinting at fellow explorers nearby.

map.narration: Inside the crate you find a folded ranger map annotated with safe paths and hazard icons.

grove.narration: You follow soft chimes deeper into the trees as the air cools around you.

camp.narration: You descend the ridge toward a ring of tents where scavengers share breakfast stew.

ruins.narration: Guided by the annotations you hike toward the ruin's outer gate, careful to avoid the bogs marked in red.
ruins.failure_narration: Without the ranger map you'd likely wander into the bogs. Better secure a guide first.

ancient-grove.description: Luminescent spores drift between the trees. Wind sculptures hum above a spring-fed pool that glitters with moonlight even at dawn.

choices.description: Tune in to the grove's harmonic whispers.
Gather a few moonseed pods from the water's edge.

listen.narration: The grove's chords synchronize with your heartbeat. A resonance pattern lodges itself in your memory.

harvest.narration: You scoop up a moonseed pod, its shell warm and softly glowing.

return.narration: You retrace your steps to the ranger trailhead.

campfire.description: A handful of scavengers lounge around a low fire. Charts and salvage crates lie neatly stacked beside them.

choices.description: Offer supplies in exchange for gear.
Climb back up to the trailhead.

greet.narration: The scavenger captain thanks you for lending an ear and mentions a spare lockpick kit they could part with.

trade.narration: You trade the moonseed pod for a compact lockpick kit reinforced with resonance-tuned picks.
records: Secured a lockpick kit from the scavengers
trade.failure_narration: The scavengers are intrigued, but they want something rare from the grove before parting with their kit.

return.narration: You hike back to the ranger trailhead, the fire's warmth lingering behind you.

ruined-gate.description: Cracked stone pillars flank a sealed archway. Resonant glyphs glimmer faintly along the frame, reacting to nearby motion.

choices.description: Study the glyphs etched into the arch.
Return to the trailhead to prepare.

survey.narration: The glyphs depict past expeditions. You note a symbol matching the resonance you heard in the grove.

unlock.narration: Tuning the lockpick kit to the grove's harmony, you release the gate's final latch. The arch yawns open toward a misty courtyard.
unlock.failure_narration: Without specialized tools, the resonance lock resists every attempt.

retreat.narration: You retreat to the trailhead, planning your next move.

inner-courtyard.description: Mist drifts between statues surrounding an ancient bonfire pit. Paths branch toward archives, workshops, and a silent bell tower.

choices.description: Take a moment to celebrate your progress.
Sketch ideas for expanding this adventure.
Head back to the trailhead to reset.

celebrate.narration: You breathe in the cool mist, proud of reaching the courtyard. New chapters await future authors.

plan.narration: You jot down hooks for archives, workshops, and bell tower scenes future designers can build out.

return.narration: You retrace your path to the trailhead, ready to iterate on the template.
